body_html: Hi guys. Fresh Xoogler here, I think we talked when my ldap was jucor@. Quick update on this: I've just installed TF r0.11 on OSX 10.11.3 in a virtualenv with Cuda 8.0.47 and cuDNN 8.0-5.1, and I had the same error as @yaroslavvb. Bad news: manually symlinking libcuda.so to libcuda.1.so was still necessary. Good news: it was also sufficient.

body: Hi guys. Fresh Xoogler here, I think we talked when my ldap was jucor@. Quick update on this: I've just installed TF r0.11 on OSX 10.11.3 in a virtualenv with Cuda 8.0.47 and cuDNN 8.0-5.1, and I had the same error as @yaroslavvb. Bad news: manually symlinking `libcuda.so` to `libcuda.1.so` was still necessary. Good news: it was also sufficient.
